bridge-type.label: SocketCAN interface for CANopen
bridge-type.description: Defines CANopen interface which uses SocketCAN under the hood.

parameter.name: nodeId
parameter.label: CANopen Node ID
parameter.description: Identifier of node used to identify request made to the bus. Please be aware that this identifier impacts bus arbitration. If you wish high priority set it to values from 1 and above, if you don't want to interfere set it to 127 or less.

parameter.name: heartbeat
parameter.label: Emit heartbeat
parameter.description: Determine if binding should announce its state to the bus through standard CANopen NMT service. It might be required for some requests to work.

parameter.name: name
parameter.label: Interface name
parameter.description: Name of interface assigned by operating system.

parameter.name: discoveryMode
parameter.label: Discovery mode
parameter.description: Node discovery strategy for this CANopen connection.

options.option: Actively scan bus by sending SDO to each possible node.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh interval
parameter.description: Time between next poll cycles. If no value is given polling is based on value set on thing or bridge value.
